source.oracleReaderQuery: SELECT scm_admin.INT_Interface('USP_INT047') AS Result FROM dual;

scripts.text:

    bpc_sleeve_id,

    bpc_centralizer_qty,
    bpc_pile_seq_no,
    bpc_micropile_ind,

INSERT INTO scm_admin.order_item_fabrication_prefix (
    order_request_no,
    parent_item_no,
    mb_prefix,
    component_prefix,
    fabrication_pts,
    mb_item_no,
    component_item_no
) SELECT
    order_request_no,
    parent_item_no,
    mb_prefix,
    component_prefix,
    fabrication_pts,
    mb_item_no,
    component_item_no
FROM
    scm_admin.esb_order_item_fabrication_prefix;
